Name: My Business
About the game: My Business is the first realistic game in which you have to become a business shark. There are more than 80 types of business in the game and only you decide which business to buy and which not. You will buy and sell business. You will also have to buy ads, hire an assistant, so that you can buy even more businesses, but that's not all since random events will be offered in the game, which will deteriorate or improve your financial situation. On top of that, there will be a lottery and TOP-45 companies that are waiting for your merger with them. But let's not forget that besides you there are competitors who can also buy businesses and make it unavailable to you. You will feel like a real businessman, going through the ups and downs of this difficult job. But you can put yourself in the shoes of such great businessmen as: 1. Henry Ford 2. Steve Jobs 3. Madam CJ Walker 4. John D. Rockefeller 5. P.T. Barnum.
